Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian

Class PredictiveInfoCalculatorGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian.PredictiveInfoCalculatorGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, PredictiveInfoCalculator, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    public class PredictiveInfoCalculatorGaussian
extends PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements a PI calculator using model of Gaussian variables with linear interactions. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian as the calculator into the parent class PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for PredictiveInfoCalculator, with:

    • The constructor step being a simple call to PredictiveInfoCalculatorGaussian().
    • PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF as outlined in PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String))
    • Computed values are in nats, not bits!

    References:

    • Bialek, W., Nemenman, I., and Tishby, N., "Complexity through nonextensivity", Physica A, 302, 89-99. (2001).
    • J. P. Crutchfield, D. P. Feldman, "Regularities Unseen, Randomness Observed: Levels of Entropy Convergence", Chaos, Vol. 13, No. 1. (2003), pp. 25-54.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    PredictiveInfoCalculator, PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
